level.text: The following table sets forth the probability of winning and the probable distribution of winners in and among each prize category, based upon the total number of possible combinations in Hot Lotto®.
Number of Matches Per Ticket
Probability Distribution
Probable/Set Prize Amount
All five (5) of first set plus one (1) of the
second set
All five (5) of first set and none of the second set
Any four (4) of first set plus one (1) of the second set
Any four (4) of first set and none of
the second set
Any three (3) of first set plus one (1) of
the second set
Any three (3) of first set and none of the
second set
Any two (2) of first set plus one (1) of the second set
Any one (1) of first set plus one (1) of
the second set.
None of the first set plus one (1) of
the second set
Overall
* The Grand Prize amount does not include the Prize Reserve Account (“PRA”) deduction or any other deductions, if any.
** The Gross Grand Prize Value amount reflects the “Gross Prize Value”; the “Advertised Grand Prize” and “Withholding Taxes Paid Prize” amounts are discussed elsewhere in these Rules.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2400 (March 5, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 6656 (May 10, 2013).
